docker-linter.enable.description: Control whether docker-linter is enabled for perl files or not.

docker-linter.machine.description: The name of the docker-machine in which you run your linting container.

docker-linter.container.description: The name of the docker container in which the linting command is to be run.

docker-linter.command.description: The command to which the buffer contents is sent.

docker-linter.regexp.description: The regex that is is used to match for errors.

docker-linter.message.description: The number of the group that matches the error.

docker-linter.line.description: The number of the group that matches the line.

docker-linter.column.description: The number of the group that matches the column.

docker-linter.severity.description: The number of the group that matches the severity.

docker-linter.code.description: The number of the group that matches the code.
